item.title: Are Entry-Level jobs really Entry-Level?
item.description: If you are hereâ€¦ Well, if you are here maybe you already saw my last post on instagram or twitter. Dataviz Adventure Hi guys! here my #Makeovermonday submission for week 34, 2021. This time I made two different graphs for the same data set, which one do you think manages to communicate better? Bar chart vs radial (column?) bar chart Thank you!#infoviz #infodesign #datavisualization #dataviz pic.
